channel.title: Eclipse on Bala Subramanyam Lanka
channel.description: Recent content in Eclipse on Bala Subramanyam Lanka

item.title: Initializing IBM RAD/RSA – eclipse.ini
item.description: IBM has a mega line up in the IDE business. Some of the IDEs provided by IBM are Eclipse, Rational Application Developer, Rational Software Architect Designer, Rational Business Developer, etc, When it comes to enterprise java development or operational decision management or business modelling, people use mostly RAD/RSA.
